_sText:
I didn't make this map for anybody in specific but it was originally intended to be made for jon. from kawaiiclan (period included)

This map is relatively easy. Originally it was going to be quite hard, but I decided to fix it up and deal with yet another 11 minutes of waiting (compiling).

----------

The map is based around one gigantic center room, with rooms jutting out from the sides. I had this idea in my head for a while, and originally the map was going to have a sun, but I decided the dark red neon look was much better than just a regular sun.

Difficulty: Medium-Hard
Length: 30 seconds - 1 minute

Special thanks goes to cswalrus, raz, Antosha, and Shadow for showing up during the stream.

-----------

WARNING: This map is Really bright.   It is recommended you play with low gamma/brightness.

Edit: If you get stuck, r_drawclipbrushes 2 is your friend.
